name: @prostojs/arbac
description: Advanced Role-Based Access Control (ARBAC) for Node.js

scripts.build: rolldown -c rolldown.config.ts && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.js && rm -rf .types
scripts.version: pnpm changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: update changelog'
scripts.release: pnpm test && pnpm build && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:patch: pnpm test && pnpm build && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: pnpm test && pnpm build && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: pnpm test && pnpm build && npm version major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public

author: Artem Maltsev
